HomePage.title: Your AI-Powered Fitness Coach
HomePage.subtitle: Get personalized workout plans, nutrition advice, and motivation with HypertroQ
HomePage.metaDescription: Transform your fitness journey with HypertroQ, your AI-powered personal trainer. Get personalized workout plans, nutrition guidance, and expert coaching available 24/7.

hero.welcomeSubtitle: Ready to continue your fitness journey? Come back to the HypertroQ chat to ask questions and get personalized coaching.
hero.mainSubtitle: Your Evidence-Based AI Fitness Coach powered by cutting-edge exercise science research.
hero.mainDescription: Unlike generic AI assistants, HypertroQ eliminates fitness myths and outdated methods with science-backed training philosophy.

chatDemo.title: HypertroQ Chat
chatDemo.userQuestion: What's the optimal rep range for muscle growth?
chatDemo.aiResponse: For hypertrophy, the optimal range is typically 5-10 reps taken to 0-2 RIR (Reps in Reserve). This maximizes mechanical tension, which is the primary driver of muscle growth.

trustBar.description: Updated with cutting-edge studies in physiology, biomechanics, kinesiology, and nutrition science.

comparison.title: Why HypertroQ vs Generic AI?
comparison.subtitle: The difference is in the science, not the hype.
comparison.question: How many reps for muscle growth?
comparison.genericResponse: A good rep range for building muscle is typically 8-12 reps. You need to really 'feel the burn' and switch up your exercises often to 'confuse the muscle'. Also, make sure to do lots of isolation work.
comparison.hypertroqResponse: For hypertrophy, the optimal range is typically 5-10 reps taken to 0-2 RIR (Reps in Reserve). This maximizes mechanical tension, which is the primary driver of muscle growth. Based on your profile, I'd recommend compound movements with progressive overload.

freePlan.title: Free Plan

proPlan.title: Pro Plan

unlimited.title: Unlimited Conversations
unlimited.description: Chat as much as you want without daily limits. Get continuous support for your fitness journey.

personalized.title: Personalized Coaching
personalized.description: AI remembers your progress, preferences, and goals to provide truly personalized guidance.

tracking.title: Progress Tracking
tracking.description: Advanced analytics and insights to track your fitness progress and optimize your results.

questions.question: Can I cancel anytime?
questions.answer: Yes! You can cancel your Pro subscription at any time. You'll continue to have Pro access until the end of your billing period.

questions.question: What happens to my data if I downgrade?
questions.answer: Your conversation history and progress data are safely stored. You'll just be limited to 15 messages per day on the free plan.

questions.question: Is there a free trial?
questions.answer: Every new user starts with our free plan which includes 15 messages per day. You can upgrade to Pro anytime to unlock unlimited access.
